mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECORD_WEIGHT (R_W_NO, R_W_ID, R_WEIGHT, R_WEIGHT_DATE) VALUES (RECORD_WEIGHT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rId}, #{rWeight}, #{rWeightDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE RECORD_WEIGHT SET R_WEIGHT = #{rWeight} WHERE R_W_ID = #{rId} AND R_WEIGHT_DATE = #{rWeightDate}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RECORD_WEIGHT WHERE R_W_ID = #{rId} AND R_WEIGHT_DATE = #{rWeightDate}
